reviews.review: There's no puzzle game quite like this one. Interesting gameplay, interesting machanics, and an interesting story.
Glados is back but potato now

Portal 2 is one of my all-time favorite games. The puzzles are complex and interesting, there's tons to explore and learn, and the visual style and voice acting is fantastic. I've replayed this game multiple times and just repurchased it again because I love it so much. Every time I play, I find stuff that I missed in the previous rounds. Overall, it's very much worth it and this is one game I would consider a must-buy, especially if you like puzzle solving and futuristic settings.

I played the first Portal back when it initially released, well, within the first year at least. I loved it, but for some reason it took me forever to get around to playing Portal 2, there are so many games out there to be played that some games just get tossed in your back log forever, this one, was tossed into a 10 year backlog. Well, back log no more, I finally played it and it's absolutely incredible. I could say that I wish that I had played it sooner, but I'm glad I didn't because it was a fresh experience. This is one of those games that ruins other games for you because it is so good.
holy shit i think i accidentally discovered the best puzzle game ever
Portal 2 is an amazing game. It's got great graphics and incredible true-to-life physics. The story is compelling and the challenges are unique. Certainly worth getting if you liked Portal.
addictive and challenging, really gets your brain working.
This is a great game definitely worth the money
This has to be the best game that a lot of people have never heard of.
theres a reason it has a 98% approval rating
Si, es la parte donde os mata.
puzzle ez, lore & easter egg deep bgt

When I first tried Portal on my Xbox 360 many years ago. I thought the game was absolute shit. that nothing, and I do mean nothing, could be worse than it.  I was totally wrong. in a good way of course! because years later I replayed Portal and I absolutely loved it! (Especially with Developer Commentary on.)

So how's the sequel?

It's pretty good. I like how each chapter actually has a name and it's pretty funny at times. (Mainly the intro and how it teaches the player to ju- I mean, say "Apple".) It's also quite fun figuring out what does and doesn't work in the game. and the Ratman secrets are back! and better than ever! Is it a good starting point for a first time player of the series? probably not, but it's fun anyways! best part of this game is the price. You can buy two things with 9.99 (Plus Tax) and those are a copy of Portal 2, or 4 hamburgers and a Sprite from McDonalds.

10/10

Get. It. Now.
(Or get the Portal 1 and 2 bundle for the best price!)

Очередная легендарная игра Valve. Хорошая и интересная игра с головоломками с возможностью кооператива, весело провёл время с другом.

Игра классная, быстро прошёл сюжет, сам он интересный. После прохождения отправился наполнять Steam своими кринжовыми картами, Играть с рандомными игроками в двойной режим, преподавал напарнику урок доверия (если правильно назвал). Короче всё круто!

이걸 이제서야 하다니...1편 끝내고 바로 2편 달렸는데 정말 새로운 경험이었음. 이건 정말 게임도 하나의 예술이 될수 있단걸 보여주는 획기적인 시도였음 나름 충격 먹으면서 했음;;; 지금 했는데도 요즘 게임이라고 해도 믿겠음. 영원히 잊지 못할 게임이 되었음. 방금 끝판 깨고 적는거라 그런가 내 말투도 인공지능 처럼 변하네;; 1편 2편 엔딩도 참 신선했음 ㅋㅋ
